title: SOURCE McCulloch v Maryland Congress powers

content.question: The decision of the Supreme Court upheld the principle that

choices.label: the federal government and the state governments are equal
Congress has only those powers specifically enumerated in the Constitution
Congress has the power to make laws to carry out its constitutional duties
the federal government alone may levy taxes

content.answer: Congress has the power to make laws to carry out its constitutional duties
